data.title: Laurie Lewis
data.meta_description:
Freight '98 by Laurie Lewis, released 01 January 2021

1. Visualize
2. Refugee
3. Girlfriend Guard Your Heart
4. Ban and Balm
5. Fine Line
6. Tattoo
7. I Will Take Back My Heart
8. Love Is a Lonely Street
9. Angel on His Shoulder
10. Kiss Me Before I Die
11. Knocking on Your Door Again

There’s no beating a live album. The thrill of a flawless execution, knowing this wasn’t just one of a dozen takes. The lightning reflexes as one musician responds to a subtle improvisation from another. The raw, vulnerable, adrenaline-fueled emotion that’s so rarely achieved in the closed system of the recording studio. This collection captures all the immediacy and energy of live performance from some of the best, with a clarity of sound like you’ve got a front row seat. — Allegra Thompson 

Many thanks to Paul for capturing the music; to the Freight, my hometown venue, for providing a testing ground throughout my entire career; and to my incredibly talented and wonderful friends for learning my songs. Thanks, Allegra, for insightful ears (is that a thing?); and to you, The Listener.
data.text: For fiddler, guitarist, singer, and songwriter Laurie Lewis, the traditions of bluegrass and folk aren’t so much tools in her hands, but burning sources of inspiration that have driven her through a 30+ year career at the forefront of American roots music. A pioneering woman in bluegrass, Laurie has paved the way for many, always guided by her own love of traditional music. ... more
